text:
Marielle Stiles Heller (born October 1, 1979) is an American screenwriter, director, and actress. She is the writer and director of the movie "The Diary of a Teenage Girl".
In January of 2018, it was announced that Heller would direct a biopic about Fred Rogers called "A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood" with Tom Hanks as Mr. Rogers.
